steps.name: Given user has already logged in to application
When User clicks on the Admin tab from the menu
And Admin panel page should display Admin / User Management options
When User clicks on the add button
And User enters employee name "Linda Smith"

steps.name: And User clicks on the save button
Then The system should show a success message "Successfully Saved"
And The new user "linda.Smith" should appear in the user list
